name: erral.github.io
body:
### Talks

These are some talks I have lately given:

- [EITB Nahieran: askatu bideoak API honen bidez](https://erral.github.io/eitbapi/) at [EuroPython 2016](https://ep2016.europython.eu/en/) in Bilbao

- [Arbitraje en Ajedrez: ayer, hoy y mañana](https://erral.github.io/charla-arbitraje-bcn) in Barcelona, at a chess arbiters' meeting, organized by [Federació Catalana d'Escacs](http://www.escacs.cat)

- [Ansible to rule the world](https://erral.github.io/ansible-to-rule-the-world) at [PySS 2016](https://pyss16.pyss.org) in Donostia.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
